Class Tower

public class Tower
extends java.lang.Object

Tower unit representing the tower that holds disks

push

public boolean push(Disk disk)
push a disk above of all disks at the top of the tower

Parameters:

Returns:

removeDisk

public Disk removeDisk(int x,
                       int y)
removes a disk from the top of the tower stack id its co-ordinates coincidence with the given x and y location

Parameters:
x - the x location of the point
y - the y location of the point
Returns:
the removed disk or null if none coincidence with the given location

intersect

returns true if the tower intersects with disk

Parameters:
disk - the disk to test intersection on
Returns:
true if the tower intersects with given disk

clear

public void clear()
clears the tower of the disks

pop

public Disk pop()
removes the top element from the towers stack

Returns:
the disk at the top of the tower and removes it from the stack

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Returns:
true if the tower is empty from disks

peekDisk

public Disk peekDisk(int x,
                     int y)
Parameters:
x - the x location of a point
y - the y location of a point
Returns:
the top disk if it contains the point described by (x, y) without removing it from the stack
